text: Robert William Gary Moore (4 April 1952 â€“ 6 February 2011) or Gary Moore, was a musician from East Belfast, Northern Ireland. He was a blues rock guitarist and singer. On 6 February 2011, Moore died in his hotel room in Estepona, Spain of a heart attack. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official site Category:1952 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Irish guitarists Category:British guitarists Category:Musicians from Northern Ireland Category:British rock musicians Category:British songwriters
